entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
